description: Bitcoin is the first decentralized digital currency, operating on a peer-to-peer network without the need for a central authority. It allows for secure and transparent transactions over a distributed ledger known as the blockchain.

Wrapped Bitcoin (WBTC) is an ERC-20 token that represents Bitcoin (BTC) on the Ethereum blockchain. It enables Bitcoin holders to participate in the Ethereum ecosystem, including decentralized finance (DeFi) applications, while maintaining the value and backing of BTC.

Polygon (formerly Matic Network) is a Layer 2 scaling solution for Ethereum that aims to improve the speed, reduce the cost, and enhance the scalability of transactions on Ethereum by utilizing sidechains. It is designed to support a multi-chain Ethereum ecosystem, allowing developers to build and connect decentralized applications (DApps) and blockchain networks.

Ethena USD (USDe) is a decentralized stablecoin designed to maintain a 1:1 peg with the US Dollar. It operates on the Ethereum blockchain and is backed by a combination of algorithmic mechanisms and collateral assets. Ethena USD aims to provide a stable and secure medium of exchange within the decentralized finance (DeFi) ecosystem.

Arbitrum is a Layer 2 scaling solution for Ethereum that uses Optimistic Rollups to increase transaction throughput and reduce costs. It allows developers to deploy smart contracts with greater efficiency and lower fees while maintaining the security of the Ethereum network.

crvUSD is a stablecoin launched by Curve Finance, a decentralized exchange protocol designed for low-slippage swaps between stablecoins. crvUSD is pegged to the US dollar and is integrated into the Curve ecosystem, allowing users to engage in decentralized finance (DeFi) activities with reduced volatility and consistent value.

Optimism is a Layer 2 scaling solution for Ethereum that leverages Optimistic Rollups to enhance transaction speed and reduce gas fees. It is designed to make Ethereum transactions faster and more affordable while maintaining compatibility with the Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM).

Rocket Pool ETH (rETH) is a liquid staking token for Ethereum provided by Rocket Pool, a decentralized Ethereum 2.0 staking protocol. rETH represents a user's staked ETH plus any accrued staking rewards. It allows users to participate in Ethereum staking while maintaining liquidity and earning rewards.

Ondo is a decentralized finance (DeFi) protocol focused on providing structured financial products. Ondo offers tokenized tranches that allow users to earn yield with varying levels of risk. The platform aims to bridge the gap between traditional finance and decentralized finance by creating innovative financial instruments.

dYdX is a decentralized trading platform that offers perpetual contracts, margin trading, spot trading, and lending on the Ethereum blockchain. It is designed to provide a non-custodial and decentralized alternative to traditional financial exchanges, allowing users to trade directly from their wallets while maintaining control over their funds.

Solana is a high-performance, decentralized blockchain platform designed to support large-scale decentralized applications (DApps) and cryptocurrencies. It is known for its fast transaction speeds and low fees, making it ideal for both developers and users.

Ethereum is a decentralized, open-source blockchain platform that enables the creation of smart contracts and decentralized applications (DApps). It supports a wide range of applications from finance to gaming and beyond.
Decentralised protocol allowing people to lend and borrow cryptocurrency. Users can earn interest on deposits and borrow assets.
Curve Finance is a decentralized exchange liquidity pool designed for extremely efficient stablecoin trading.
Compound is a decentralized finance protocol that allows users to lend and borrow cryptocurrencies. Users can earn interest on their crypto assets.
A decentralized lending protocol.
Pendle is a yield trading protocol that allows users to tokenize and trade future yield.
Decentralized lending protocol part of the MakerDAO ecosystem

FRAX Finance is a decentralized finance protocol that includes a unique fractional-algorithmic stablecoin (FRAX) and a governance token (FXS). It aims to provide a scalable and decentralized stable currency.
Maple Finance is a decentralized institutional capital marketplace that provides undercollateralized loans for institutional borrowers and fixed income opportunities for lenders.
Yearn Finance is a decentralized finance (DeFi) platform that offers a suite of products like vaults and yield farming strategies for users to maximize their returns on digital assets.
Uniswap is a decentralized exchange (DEX) protocol built on Ethereum, allowing users to trade ERC-20 tokens directly from their wallets without the need for a centralized intermediary.
Decentralized stablecoin, pegged to the US Dollar and backed by a mix of other cryptocurrencies. It is part of the MakerDAO ecosystem.
Maker is a decentralized finance (DeFi) platform on Ethereum, allowing users to generate DAI stablecoins by locking up collateral in a smart contract.
Lido is a liquid staking solution for Ethereum and other proof-of-stake (PoS) blockchains, allowing users to stake their assets while maintaining liquidity by receiving staking derivatives.
Ethena is a decentralized finance protocol that offers synthetic assets on the Ethereum blockchain, enabling users to gain exposure to real-world assets without needing to hold the underlying assets.
Rocket Pool is a decentralized Ethereum staking protocol that allows users to stake their ETH and earn rewards without needing to manage their own validator.
Leverage protocol that allows users to take leverage and utilize it across various DeFi protocols.
DeFi protocol that allows users to create self-repaying loans by using their deposited assets as collateral.
Centralised stablecoin pegged to the U.S. dollar, emitted by Circle
Centralised stablecoin pegged to the U.S. dollar, emitted by Tether
Decentralized oracle network enabling smart contracts on blockchains to securely interact with external data feeds, events, and payment methods.
Decentralized marketplace for unsecured institutional capital, allowing institutions to borrow funds without collateral from liquidity providers.
A platform built on top of Curve Finance that allows Curve liquidity providers to earn higher returns without locking their tokens. Convex simplifies staking and yield farming for Curve users.

stETH is a liquid staking token representing staked Ether on the Ethereum 2.0 Beacon Chain through the Lido protocol. stETH allows users to earn staking rewards while maintaining liquidity, enabling participation in DeFi activities.

weETH is a tokenized version of Ether (ETH) on the Ethereum blockchain. It represents ETH in a wrapped format, enabling it to be used in decentralized finance (DeFi) applications that require ERC-20 tokens.

wETH is a tokenized version of Ether (ETH) on the Ethereum blockchain. It represents ETH in a wrapped ERC-20 format, enabling it to be used seamlessly in decentralized finance (DeFi) applications that require ERC-20 tokens.

sDAI is a staked version of DAI, a decentralized stablecoin from MakerDAO. sDAI allows users to earn additional yield on their DAI holdings by participating in the MakerDAO staking mechanism, contributing to the security and stability of the Maker ecosystem.
address: Specific address information not publicly available yet

description: cbETH is a liquid staking token representing staked Ether on the Ethereum 2.0 Beacon Chain through the Coinbase platform. cbETH allows users to earn staking rewards while maintaining liquidity, enabling participation in DeFi activities.

SILO is a governance token for the Silo Finance protocol, a decentralized, non-custodial lending platform that allows users to create isolated lending markets (silos) for any token. Each silo operates independently, minimizing risks of cross-market contagion.

STG is the governance token for the Stargate Finance protocol, a decentralized and composable native asset bridge that enables cross-chain transfers and swaps while ensuring unified liquidity. It focuses on eliminating fragmented liquidity and providing a seamless experience for decentralized finance (DeFi) users.

FX is the governance token for the Function X (FX) Protocol, a decentralized network that enables users to build and deploy dApps, create tokens, and integrate with other blockchains. It supports cross-chain communication and is designed to facilitate seamless interactions between different blockchain ecosystems, providing a robust infrastructure for DeFi, NFTs, and more.

ANGLE is the governance token for the Angle Finance protocol, a decentralized stablecoin platform designed to issue and manage stablecoins efficiently. The protocol focuses on capital efficiency, over-collateralization, and stability, enabling users to mint, swap, and stake various stablecoins with minimal slippage and risk.

SUSHI is the governance token for SushiSwap, a decentralized finance (DeFi) platform that allows users to swap, earn, lend, borrow, and stake tokens. SushiSwap is a community-driven organization that has evolved from a simple automated market maker (AMM) to a comprehensive DeFi suite, offering innovative financial products and services.

GHO is a decentralized stablecoin introduced by Aave, a leading DeFi lending protocol. GHO is pegged to the US dollar and can be minted against a wide range of collateral assets supplied within the Aave protocol. It aims to provide a more flexible and decentralized stablecoin option for users, allowing them to borrow stablecoins while earning interest on their collateral.

BAL is the governance token for Balancer, a decentralized automated market maker (AMM) that allows users to create and manage customizable liquidity pools. Balancer offers unique features such as multi-token pools, customizable weightings, and smart order routing, providing a flexible and efficient platform for decentralized trading and liquidity provision.

FRAX is the governance token for the Frax Protocol, a decentralized stablecoin system that implements a unique fractional-algorithmic approach. Frax is designed to be a scalable and decentralized solution to stablecoins, with its value partially backed by collateral and partially stabilized algorithmically. The protocol aims to provide a highly scalable, trustless, and stable form of digital money.

1INCH is the governance token for the 1inch Network, a decentralized exchange (DEX) aggregator that sources liquidity from various DEXs to offer users the best possible trading rates. The 1inch Network includes several products, such as a DEX aggregator, a liquidity protocol, and a limit order protocol, all designed to enhance efficiency and reduce slippage in the DeFi ecosystem.

PyUSD is a stablecoin issued by PayPal, fully backed by U.S. dollar deposits, short-term U.S. Treasuries, and similar cash equivalents. PyUSD is designed to provide a stable and transparent digital currency option for payments and transfers within the PayPal ecosystem, as well as across other compatible networks. It is redeemable 1:1 for U.S. dollars.

Jito is a project focused on maximizing the performance of validators and block producers within the Solana ecosystem. It aims to optimize MEV (Maximal Extractable Value) and provide validators with tools to efficiently capture value from transaction ordering, while maintaining the security and integrity of the network.

JitoSOL is a liquid staking token on the Solana blockchain, allowing users to stake their SOL and receive JitoSOL tokens in return. These tokens can be freely traded or used within the Solana ecosystem, offering liquidity and staking rewards simultaneously. JitoSOL helps users maximize yield while participating in Solana's proof-of-stake consensus.

Avalanche is an open-source platform for launching decentralized applications and enterprise blockchain deployments in one interoperable, highly scalable ecosystem. Avalanche is the first decentralized smart contracts platform built for the scale of global finance, with near-instant transaction finality. Powered by the native AVAX token, Avalanche is designed to have low transaction fees, high throughput, and is capable of sub-second finality.

Fantom is an open-source, decentralized, and scalable blockchain platform for dApps and digital assets. It is designed to overcome the limitations of previous-generation blockchain platforms, with high transaction speeds and near-instant finality. The platform utilizes a Directed Acyclic Graph (DAG) consensus algorithm known as Lachesis, which allows for high throughput and low fees. Powered by the native FTM token, Fantom is optimized for performance and is suitable for a wide range of decentralized finance (DeFi) applications.

Synthetix is a decentralized finance (DeFi) protocol on the Ethereum blockchain that provides the issuance and trading of synthetic assets. These synthetic assets, or 'Synths', are ERC-20 tokens that track the value of real-world assets like currencies, commodities, stocks, and indices. The protocol is powered by the native SNX token, which is staked by users to create Synths. Synthetix enables users to gain exposure to a variety of assets without needing to hold the underlying asset itself, offering high liquidity and zero slippage trading.

Orca is a decentralized exchange (DEX) on the Solana blockchain, known for its user-friendly interface and fast, low-cost transactions. It allows users to swap tokens, provide liquidity, and earn rewards through yield farming. Orca also features a unique 'Fair Price' indicator, which helps users avoid front-running and get better trade execution.

Spell Token (SPELL) is the governance and utility token of the Abracadabra.money platform, a decentralized finance (DeFi) protocol that allows users to borrow the stablecoin MIM (Magic Internet Money) by collateralizing interest-bearing crypto assets. SPELL holders can stake their tokens to earn rewards and participate in the governance of the Abracadabra protocol.

Liquity (LQTY) is the governance token of the Liquity protocol, a decentralized, interest-free borrowing platform built on Ethereum. Liquity allows users to borrow LUSD, a USD-pegged stablecoin, by using ETH as collateral. LQTY holders can stake their tokens to earn rewards and participate in protocol governance.

Liquity USD (LUSD) is a decentralized stablecoin pegged to the US Dollar. It is minted through the Liquity protocol by locking up ETH as collateral. LUSD maintains its stability through an algorithmic approach and can be redeemed at any time for its underlying collateral.

Oasis Network is a privacy-focused, layer-1 blockchain designed for open finance and a responsible data economy. It features confidential smart contracts and the ability to tokenize data, enabling new use cases in DeFi and beyond.

Olympus is a decentralized reserve currency protocol based on the OHM token. It aims to build a policy-controlled currency system, in which the behavior of the OHM token is controlled at a high level by the DAO.
